page.title: 15GAMES
page.content:
We made asurvey on games played in the playground.There were 37 different games played.The most popular game played was{tig}.The second popular was {kingy}which often known as Ball Tig. The third most popular was{football}.
For a game of {ball tig}you need a soft ball and a group of people.One person is chosen as {tig}.Another person is given the ball and throws the ball away.Then the person chosen as tig goes and gets the ball.As soon as he has the ball in his hand he says "FREEZE",the group of people has to stand still.The person with the ball takes 5 stides to the nearest person. He throws the ball at that person and if he misses he will start all over again.If he hits someone then that person will start the game again.
